info.name: INotify file watcher
info.summary: Adds support detecting changes in local external storages
info.description:
Adds support detecting changes in local external storages with occ files_external:notify.
Note that there are scalability limitations to using `inotify` on large folder structures, see the [README](https://github.com/icewind1991/files_inotify/blob/master/README.md) for more information
info.author: Robin Appelman
